data.actual_result: The app opens for like a second and closes immediately
data.expected_result: It should open the app and let you choose the new pic
data.short_description: Won't let you change server pic using the file manager option( works only on OnePlus devices so far)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open server settings - Try to change the server pic - It should prompt you to choose an application, select file manager (might be called something else on other devices)
